title: Confinement in jails
context: [ยง124A-15] Confinement in jails. Persons confined other than in a guardhouse, whether before, during, or after trial by a military court, shall be confined in state correctional facilities designated by the governor or by such person as the governor may authorize to act. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
